text: @Liz_Wheeler @realDonaldTrump I don’t see any systemic racism contributing to Covid-19 here. I see a bunch of selfish kids who don’t understand self responsibility. And the Democrats want to lower voting age. They should be campaigning to move it to 25 or 30 based on this video.
